docs.snippet: The second and final part of an independent commission report, led by Canadian law professor Richard McLaren, was published on Friday and provided more details of an elaborate state-sponsored doping scheme operated by Russia....
docs.lead_paragraph: The second and final part of an independent commission report, led by Canadian law professor Richard McLaren, was published on Friday and provided more details of an elaborate state-sponsored doping scheme operated by Russia.

headline.main: Reaction to McLaren Report Into Russian Doping
headline.print_headline: Reaction to McLaren Report Into Russian Doping

docs.snippet: Russia's sports reputation was ripped apart again Friday when a new report into systematic doping detailed a vast "institutional conspiracy" that covered more than 1,000 athletes in over 30 sports and corrupted the drug-testing system at the 2012 ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia's sports reputation was ripped apart again Friday when a new report into systematic doping detailed a vast "institutional conspiracy" that covered more than 1,000 athletes in over 30 sports and corrupted the drug-testing system at the 2012 and 2014 Olympics.

headline.main: Report: Russian Doping Involved Over 1,000 Athletes
headline.print_headline: Report: Russian Doping Involved Over 1,000 Athletes

docs.snippet: Russia is building a $30 million complex for acrobatic rock'n'roll, a niche sport in which President Vladimir Putin's daughter is a leading dancer and has a senior role for development, a Reuters review of public documents has shown....

docs.snippet: A report that connected over 1,000 Russian athletes to a state-run doping system only scratched the surface of a drugs culture that may have touched all the country's Olympians, WADA Director General Olivier Niggli said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A report that connected over 1,000 Russian athletes to a state-run doping system only scratched the surface of a drugs culture that may have touched all the country's Olympians, WADA Director General Olivier Niggli said on Friday.

headline.main: Doping Scheme May Have Touched All Russian Athletes: WADA
headline.print_headline: Doping Scheme May Have Touched All Russian Athletes: WADA

docs.snippet: More than 1,000 Russian competitors across more than 30 sports were involved in an institutional conspiracy to conceal positive drug tests as Moscow "hijacked international sport" over the course of five years, an independent WADA report said on F...
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 1,000 Russian competitors across more than 30 sports were involved in an institutional conspiracy to conceal positive drug tests as Moscow "hijacked international sport" over the course of five years, an independent WADA report said on Friday.

headline.main: Russian Doping Conspiracy Benefited Over 1,000 Competitors
